EvaluationService
@Transactional(readOnly=true)
public class EvaluationServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EvaluationService

This class is a facade to the @{AdverseEventEvaluationService}, provides methods to evauate serious adverse events

Author:
Srini Akkala, Biju Joseph

Method Detail

evaluateSAERules

public EvaluationResultDTO evaluateSAERules(AdverseEventReportingPeriod reportingPeriod)
This method evaluates the SAE reporting rules on the reporting period. The output evaluation result will have the following - For new data collection , what are the suggestions - For existing data collection, what are the suggestions. - An index relating which AdverseEvent is evaluated for a data collection. - An index relating which AdverseEvent is associated to which completed reports - An index mapping which AdverseEvent is associated which suggested report definition. - Report definitions, getting amended, withdrawn, edited and created.

Specified by:
evaluateSAERules in interface EvaluationService
Parameters:
reportingPeriod -
Returns:

findRequiredReportDefinitions

public void findRequiredReportDefinitions(ExpeditedAdverseEventReport expeditedData,
                                          java.util.List<AdverseEvent> aeList,
                                          Study study,
                                          EvaluationResultDTO evaluationResult)
This method invokes the AdverseEventEvaluationService to obtain the report definitions suggested. Then process that information, to get the adverse event result EvaluationResultDTO Overview on extra processing 0. Ignore all the 'soft deleted' reports suggested by rules engine. 1. If child report or a report of the same group is active , parent report suggested by rules is ignored. 2. All manually selected active reports are suggested by caAERS 3. If there is a manual selection, ignore the others suggested by rules 4. If there is an AE modified, which is part of submitted report, force amend it. 5. If any, Withdraw all active reports (non manually selected), that are not suggested.

Parameters:
expeditedData - - The ExpeditedAdverseEventReport
